mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.name AS name,A.parent_id AS parentId,A.hospital_id AS hospitalId,A.manager_id AS managerId,A.logo AS logo,A.website AS website,A.province AS province,A.city AS city,A.address AS address,A.email AS email,A.phone AS phone,A.tel AS tel,A.fax AS fax,A.qq AS qq,A.weixin AS weixin,A.weibo AS weibo,A.qr_code AS qrCode,A.qr_code2 AS qrCode2,A.cs_name AS csName,A.cs_email AS csEmail,A.cs_phone AS csPhone,A.cs_qq AS csQq,A.cs_weixin AS csWeixin,A.skin_id AS skinId,A.position_ids AS positionIds,A.position_names AS positionNames,A.title_ids AS titleIds,A.title_names AS titleNames,A.tags AS tags,A.words AS words,A.introduction AS introduction,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.main_ids AS mainIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.attr_num AS attrNum,A.attr_date AS attrDate,A.attr_datetime AS attrDatetime,A.sequence AS sequence,A.description AS description,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
,pca.area_name AS provinceName, pca1.area_name AS cityName ,h.whole_name AS hospitalName,d.name AS parentName
LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca ON A.province = pca.id LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca1 ON A.city = pca1.id LEFT JOIN hospital h ON h.id = A.hospital_id LEFT JOIN department d ON d.id = A.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
